chat.model

Class Chatbot

  • java.lang.Object
    • chat.model.Chatbot

  • public class Chatbot
extends java.lang.Object
    Base version of the 2015 Chatbot class. Only stub methods are provided. Students will complete methods as part of the project.
    Version:
    1.0 10/14/16
    Author:
    Seth Morris

    • Method Detail

      • lengthChecker

        public boolean lengthChecker(java.lang.String currentInput)
        Checks the length of the supplied string. Returns false if the supplied String is empty or null, otherwise returns true.
        Parameters:
        currentInput -
        Returns:
        A true or false based on the length of the supplied String.

      • contentChecker

        public boolean contentChecker(java.lang.String currentInput)
        Checks if the supplied String matches the content area for this Chatbot instance.
        Parameters:
        currentInput - The supplied String to be checked.
        Returns:
        Whether it matches the content area.

      • politicalTopicChecker

        public boolean politicalTopicChecker(java.lang.String currentInput)
        Checks if supplied String matches ANY of the topics in the politicalTopicsList. Returns true if it does find a match and false if it does not match.
        Parameters:
        currentInput - The supplied String to be checked.
        Returns:
        Whether the String is contained in the ArrayList.

      • memeChecker

        public boolean memeChecker(java.lang.String currentInput)
        Checks to see that the supplied String value is in the current memesList variable.
        Parameters:
        currentInput - The supplied String to be checked.
        Returns:
        Whether the supplied String is a recognized meme.
